attributes.action: Introduce better pensions for the armed forces that mirror the pension arrangements for MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As those in the UK's armed forces who have served thier country are as entitled to as generous a pension scheme as those who have served thier country as MP's, this petition calls for those in the armed forces who have been pensioned off due to; injuries (mental or physical) or for having served over 20 years to receive a pension that equates to that calculated in pro rata terms for Members of Parliament, being at least two thirds of final income, etc.
